name: Nagayami Nights Demo
description:
This demo features the first hour+ of my solo-developed game Nagayami Nights, currently in development and planned for release in Q3 2023!

An adventure RPG set in a world where the sun has disappeared. Explore a little further every journey as siblings Ayumu and Rina, recruiting survivors and battling ghosts in turn-based, minigame-style combat.

Please understand that the game is still a work in progress. Some music and sounds are not done yet, and there are some unfinished/placeholder assets.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Controls:  (tutorial in-game)
Arrow keys: move
Z: select
X: cancel / use tool
C: swap tool
A: open menu wheel
S: shout (speak to NPC)
Space: miscellaneous actions
Escape: toggle screen size

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Thank you for playing! Any feedback, criticism or ideas are greatly appreciated! I'm a solo developer and your support means a lot! You can contact me on twitter @yozorakii, on discord Yozoraki#5994, by email yozorakii@gmail or comment below!
